FuncDef:
The user-qos cir-zero command sets the CIR of user traffic when the CIR and PIR delivered by the RADIUS server are both 0s.
By default, the CIR is subject to the device specification when the CIR and PIR delivered by the RADIUS server are both 0s.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the CIR is subject to the device specification when the CIR and PIR delivered by the RADIUS server are both 0s.
-

Specifies the CIR when the CIR and PIR delivered by the RADIUS server are both 0s.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295, in bit/s.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command is used to set the CIR for user traffic when the CIR when the CIR and PIR delivered by the RADIUS server are both 0s.
When you run the user-qos cir-zero command several times, the latest configuration overrides the previous configurations.
This command can be used only when the CIR when the CIR and PIR delivered by the RADIUS server are both 0s.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
